long_description: Get superior clarity and glare reduction with Oakley A-Frame(R) polarized ski goggles. Urethane frame construction stays flexible, even in extreme cold. XYZ Optics(R) delivers a wide field of downward and side vision, and it enhances clarity at all angles of view. Dual vented lens design, vents below lenses and F-3 antifog treatment work together to fight fogging. Triple-layer polar fleece face foam provides comfort and wicks moisture at skin-contact areas. Wide, adjustable elastic strap gives a comfortable and secure fit, and articulating strap clips evenly distribute pressure on the face whether you're wearing a helmet or not. Polarized VR28 lens tint provides increased contrast and excellent glare reduction; 14% light transmission is best for medium to bright light. Polarized lenses reduce haze and distortion; Oakley uses a patented process to infuse the lens material around the polarized filter and ensure bonding at a molecular level. Lens supplies 100% eye protection against UVA, UVB and UVC light; durable lens material provides impact resistance. Fits small and medium faces, helmet compatible.
short_description: Get superior clarity and glare reduction with Oakley A-Frame(R) polarized ski goggles.
